alert.note: Alert for Clarke; Jones (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 18 at 5:53AM CDT until March 18 at 6:15AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 AM CDT FOR EASTERN CLARKE AND SOUTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 553 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Alamucha to 6 miles southeast of De Soto to near Ovett, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Crandall around 600 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Shubuta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for southeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
